title:
Re: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics
								Quote
						Post
								by wbxpress » Thu Jul 19, 2012 7:01 am
			Just like categories in Wordpress blog.
Board
--Forum
----Topic 1 about Cat
----Topic 2 about Rat
----Topic 3 about Cat
----Topic 4 about Rat
----Topic 5 about Tiger
Few buttons near footer: CAT, RAT, TIGER
Users when click 'RAT' then he /she may view:
Board
--Forum
----Topic 2 about Rat
----Topic 4 about Rat
							http://www.askwb.com/

			wbxpress wrote:Can anyone help me please. 
this is not something that phpbb does. it does not have "tags"  like a blog does.
you would have to try to find someone to write up a MOD for something like this.
try the MOD release forum and/or the MOD request forum here.
robert
